          <h2>
           Find Background Information on a Topic
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_7" id="content21249436">
          <div id="boxatt21249436" class="boxatt">
           <div class="embedclass">
            <img src="http://corp.credoreference.com/images/logos/Credo-Black-landscape-%20147x50.png" alt="Credo Logo" />
            <form action="javascript:void;" onsubmit="javascript:return credoMultiSearchBasic(document.forms.credoMultiSearchFormBasic);" method="GET" name="credoMultiSearchFormBasic">
             <input type="hidden" name="ubasic" value="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com/search/advanced/?include={0}&amp;headingsOnly=false&amp;sort=relevance" />
             <label for="qbasic">
              Search
             </label>
             <input type="text" id="qbasic" value="" size="15" />
             <input type="image" border="0" name="Submit" value="search" src="http://literati.credoreference.com/images/tools/go_button.png" alt="Submit Button" width="54" height="31" style="top:10px; position:relative;" />
             <br />
             <script type="text/javascript">
              function credoMultiSearchBasic(f){if(f.qbasic.value=='Search for...'||f.qbasic.value==''){alert('Please enter a search.');}else{var qbasic=escape(f.qbasic.value);var ubasic=f.ubasic.value.replace("{0}",qbasic);window.open(ubasic,"_blank");}return false;}
             </script>
            </form>
           </div>

     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21328731">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21328731">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21328731">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference Works Focused on Food
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21328731">
          <p>
           Cultural and food encyclopedias in/via Trexler Library
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 60px;">
           <a target="_blank" href="http://go.galegroup.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/ps/eToc.do?rcDocId=GALE%7CCX3273300077&amp;inPS=true&amp;prodId=GVRL&amp;userGroupName=mul_coll&amp;resultClickType=AboutThisPublication&amp;contentModuleId=GVRL&amp;searchType=BasicSearchForm&amp;docId=GALE%7C1VIM">
            <em>
             Gale Encyclopedia of Multicultural America
            </em>
           </a>
           <br />
           <em>
            American Immigrant Cultures&nbsp;
           </em>
           (Ref. Collection 305.800973 L657a)
           <br />
           <a target="_blank" href="http://linker.worldcat.org/?bKey=10.1093%2Facref%2F9780195154375.001.0001%2Facref-9780195154375&amp;rft.institution_id=2547&amp;pkgName=oro&amp;rft.oclcnum=53476629&amp;linkclass=to_article&amp;provider=OUP&amp;title=Oxford+Encyclopedia+of+Food+and+Drink+in+America&amp;rft.content=ebook%2Cvideo%2Caudio%2Cimage&amp;linkScheme=oup.highwire&amp;isbn=9780195154375&amp;jHome=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.oxfordreference.com%2Fview%2F10.1093%2Facref%2F9780195154375.001.0001%2Facref-9780195154375&amp;rfr_id=info%2Fsid%3Aoclc.org%2FWCL&amp;rft.order_by=preference&amp;localstem=https%3A%2F%2Fmuhlenberg.idm.oclc.org%2Flogin%3Furl%3D&amp;linktype=best">
            <em>
             Oxford Encyclopedia of Food and Drink in America
            </em>
           </a>
           (Ref. Collection 641.3003)
           <br />
           <a target="_blank" href="http://go.galegroup.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/ps/eToc.do?rcDocId=GALE%7CCX1513300127&amp;inPS=true&amp;prodId=GVRL&amp;userGroupName=mul_coll&amp;resultClickType=AboutThisPublication&amp;contentModuleId=GVRL&amp;searchType=BasicSearchForm&amp;docId=GALE%7C4RCQ">
            <em>
             Food Cultures of the World Encyclopedia
            </em>
           </a>
           <br />
           <em>
            <a target="_blank" href="http://go.galegroup.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/ps/i.do?isbn=9780684315904&amp;v=2.1&amp;u=mul_coll&amp;it=BIourl&amp;p=GVRL&amp;sw=w">
             Encyclopedia of Latin American History and Culture
             <br />
            </a>
           </em>
           <em>
            <a target="_blank" href="http://go.galegroup.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/ps/eToc.do?rcDocId=GALE%7CCX3403400153&amp;inPS=true&amp;prodId=GVRL&amp;userGroupName=mul_coll&amp;resultClickType=AboutThisPublication&amp;contentModuleId=GVRL&amp;searchType=BasicSearchForm&amp;docId=GALE%7C5CJU">
             Encyclopedia of Food and Culture
             <br />
            </a>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/0PFC">
             Countries and Their Cultures
            </a>
           </em>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21328731" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>

         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21328732">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Authoritative books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21328732">
          <div id="boxatt21328732" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24830919">
              <a id="link_24830919" href="http://linker.worldcat.org/?jHome=https%3A%2F%2Fmuhlenberg.idm.oclc.org%2Flogin%3Furl%3Dhttp%3A%2F%2Fsearch.credoreference.com%2Fcontent%2Ftitle%2Fcupfood&amp;linktype=best" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24830919,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Microbial Chefs', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24830919}); ">
               Cambridge History of World Food
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Research essays on the development of cuisine globally.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24830922">
              Culture and Customs of Colombia
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Trexler Library, level C, call # 986.1063 W726c
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24830923">
              Culture and Customs of Peru
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Trexler Library, level C, call # 985.06 F383c
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24830921">
              <a id="link_24830921" href="http://linker.worldcat.org/?jHome=https%3A%2F%2Fmuhlenberg.idm.oclc.org%2Flogin%3Furl%3Dhttp%3A%2F%2Fsite.ebrary.com%2Flib%2Fmuhlenberg%2FTop%3Fid%3D10005641&amp;linktype=best" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24830921,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Microbial Chefs', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24830921}); ">
               Culture and Customs of the Dominican Republic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24830918">
              <a id="link_24830918" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24830918,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Microbial Chefs', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24830917">
              <a id="link_24830917" href="http://www.google.com/books" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24830917,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Microbial Chefs', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12378397}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Portions of the text of many books can be found here.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24830920">
              <a id="link_24830920" href="http://linker.worldcat.org/?jHome=https%3A%2F%2Fmuhlenberg.idm.oclc.org%2Flogin%3Furl%3Dhttp%3A%2F%2Fmuhlenberg.eblib.com%2Fpatron%2FFullRecord.aspx%3Fp%3D339318&amp;linktype=best" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24830920,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Microbial Chefs', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24830920}); ">
               Latino Food Culture
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               1: Historical overview -- 2: Major foods and ingredients -- 3: Cooking -- 4: Meals -- 5: Eating out -- 6: Special occasions -- 7: Diet and health -- Glossary -- Resource guide -- Bibliography -- Index.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>

       <div id="wrapbox21328738">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21328738">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21328738">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles (popular and scholarly)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21328738">
          <div id="boxatt21328738" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24830927">
              <a id="link_24830927" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24830927,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Microbial Chefs', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12618737}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Good starting place for journals, and includes the full text of about 3000 journals. Limit to "peer reviewed" to find only scholarly articles. Back issues of journals begin as early as 1990. Recent issues may not be included yet, due to publisher agreement. Journals held in Trexler Library are marked accordingly.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24830928">
              <a id="link_24830928" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=31h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24830928,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Microbial Chefs', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12767749}); ">
               America History &amp; Life
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               U.S. history and culture journal articles.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24832760">
              <a id="link_24832760" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=reh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24832760,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Microbial Chefs', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12465744}); ">
               ATLA Religion
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Index to research literature in world religions and related studies, with many links to full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24830929">
              <a id="link_24830929" href="http://scholar.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24830929,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Microbial Chefs', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19855349}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Broad-based access to scholarly journal articles, especially when connecting to campus journal holdings.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24830930">
              <a id="link_24830930" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24830930,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Microbial Chefs', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12456990}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database for non-U.S. history. Some full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24832754">
              <a id="link_24832754" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24832754,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Microbial Chefs', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286586}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides full text of scholarly journals from most academic disciplines. Coverage is from the inception of the journal through three to five years ago.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile5667510" class="profile_wrapper">
       <div class="roundbox outerbox">
        <div class="roundbox headerbox">

            </h2>
           </td>
          </tr>

             </div>
